description: The ID number of the simulation. All rows with the same value of `sim` refer to the same simulated season.
The abbreviation representing the team
The conference the team is in (such as `AFC`)
The division the team is in (such as `-string NFC West`)
How many regular season games the team has played
The number of games the team has won, counting ties as 0.5 wins
The number of games the team has won, ignoring ties.
The number of games the team has lost.
The number of games that ended in a tie.
The win rate of the team. Equal to `wins / games`.
The win rate of the teams in games played against teams in the same division.
The win rate of the teams in games played against teams in the same conference.
Strength of Victory. The combined win rate of teams this team has beaten.
Strength of Schedule. The combined win rate of teams this team has played.
What place the team finished in its division.
If the team obtained its division rank through a tiebreaker, the tiebreaker used and how many teams were tied at that time is shown here.
What place the team finished in its conference.
If the team obtained its conference rank through a tiebreaker, the tiebreaker used and how many teams were tied at that time is shown here.
The game_type of the team's last game. Super Bowl winners will be 'SB_WIN'
Which pick the team earned in the following NFL Draft. Note that this value is before any trades, forfeits, or other modifications to draft picks.
If the team obtained its draft rank through a tiebreaker, the tiebreaker used and how many teams were tied at that time is shown here.
